title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 56.7 - Fine for pilots carried to sea through negligence or lack of skill
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 56.7 - Fine for pilots carried to sea through negligence or lack of skill

State Regulations

If, through his own negligence or want of skill, a pilot
shall be carried to sea, such pilot shall, in the discretion of the
commissioners, be subject to a fine of $100 for each week during which he shall
be unavailable for duty at the Port of New York by reason of having been so
carried to sea. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21

56.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
